title: Generate Acceptance Test Cards in Modal
description: As a product manager, I want to click "Create Acceptance Test" button and see 1-3 acceptance test cards generated in a modal with Given-When-Then text inputs so that I can quickly create structured acceptance tests.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am viewing a user story details panel
acceptanceCriteria.when: I click the "Create Acceptance Test" button
acceptanceCriteria.then: a modal opens displaying 1-3 acceptance test foam cards

acceptanceCriteria.given: the modal is open with acceptance test cards
acceptanceCriteria.then: each card contains separate text input fields for Given, When, and Then statements

acceptanceCriteria.given: an acceptance test card is displayed
acceptanceCriteria.when: I interact with the text inputs
acceptanceCriteria.then: I can independently edit the Given, When, and Then fields for each card

notes: Cards should use foam-style visual design. Each card represents one acceptance test with three distinct input fields.
